roleset.name: emphasize
roleset.note: EMPHASIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'emphasize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'say' et al. (from emphasize.01-v predicate notes)
EMPHASIS-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-9998. Comparison to emphasize.01. VN class promote-102. (from emphasis.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The statement emphasized that holders representing 75% of the shares voting at a special shareholders' meeting must agree to lift the takeover restrictions.
example.arg: that holders representing 75% of the shares voting at a special shareholders' meeting must agree to lift the takeover restrictions

example.name: with hearer
example.text: Mary emphasized to John that he must never ever call her 'Snoogie-wookums' in public.
example.arg: that he must never ever call her 'Snoogie-wookums' in public.

example.name: both args
example.text: the producers' emphasis on natural gas
